name: TETRO GEMS! Blocks Puzzle
description:
TETRO GEMS! Blocks Puzzle
Easy to play and totally free. No need to connect to network.
This game is designed for beauty specially. It have Perfect UE.
Once you start, you'll be hooked. Just have a try, you will love it!

* Features Jewel Puzzle Treasure Block *
- Don't worry! No time limits!
- Drag the block cubes to move them up.
- Simple rules and Easy to control.
- Easy to play and pleasurable game for all age.
